message: Ned learns of the Crown's profligacy; Jon Snow impresses Tyrion; Catelyn follows her husband to Kings Landing; Arya studies swordsmanship.
Arggh - haven't seen it yet. Came home and couldn't tear myself away from the Bin Laden news. Will watch it tonight!
whoa, they certainly picked a good looking guy to play Petyr Baelish

Oh, yeah! I really liked the ending of this one, with Ayla beginning her fighting training. She's terrific in the part. The foreboding of the lands beyond the wall and winter coming was done right. And yes, I think it's really getting better. Yay!
I was unsure of this show before now, but I think I'm hooked. It looks awesome.
I have a feeling it's going to pick up next week.
